docs.lead_paragraph: In gyms across the country, managers play other managers in friendly scrimmages that have become organized events complete with rankings.
docs.abstract: College basketball student managers play each other in friendly scrimmages that have become organized events, complete with rankings; games follow Division 1 schedule and are usually played on eve of regular games.

headline.main: Team Managers’ Games Take On a New Importance

docs.abstract: New York Yankees, after announcing they would no longer accept tickets printed at home, say they are willing to allow StubHub and other companies to unlock mobile tickets for resale outside team's ticket exchange.

headline.main: Yankees’ Offer Could Lead to an Accord Over Tickets

docs.lead_paragraph: Players in the new National Women’s Hockey League, including one who is part of a major Bronx construction project, are used to juggling careers.
docs.abstract: National Women's Hockey League players make only $10,000 to $25,000 a season, forcing them to juggle two careers; New York Riveters defender Gabie Figueroa is project engineer for Gilbane Building Company, which is supervising construction of proposed Kingsbridge National Ice Center in Bronx that may eventually become team's home.

headline.main: For Players in a New Women’s League, a Rink Isn’t the Only Office

docs.snippet: Monsignor Hartman wrote a syndicated column and appeared on radio and on a cable television show as part of an interfaith duo with Rabbi Marc Gellman beginning in 1987....
docs.lead_paragraph: Monsignor Hartman wrote a syndicated column and appeared on radio and on a cable television show as part of an interfaith duo with Rabbi Marc Gellman beginning in 1987.
docs.abstract: Msgr Thomas J Hartman, who traded congenial religious repartee with Rabbi Marc Gellman as Catholic half of The God Squad on TV, radio and in print, dies at age 69.

headline.main: Msgr. Thomas J. Hartman, Half of ‘God Squad,’ Dies at 69
headline.print_headline: Thomas Hartman, Catholic Half of Interfaith ‘God Squad,’ Dies at 69
